options.description: Check players against official login servers (recommended)
options.name: Online Mode

options.description: Enable monster spawning
options.name: Monsters

options.description: Enable spawning of friendly mobs
options.name: Animals

options.description: Whether to spawn NPCs
options.name: Spawn NPCs

options.description: Maximum number of players allowed to connect
options.name: Max Players

options.description: Enable players to deal other players damage
options.name: PvP

options.description: Whitelist mode allows only specified players to log on. Use whitelist add <username> to allow a new player on
options.name: Whitelist

options.description: Allow the use of flight and speed mods
options.name: Allow Flight/Speed hacks

options.description: Allows players to travel to the Nether
options.name: Allow Nether

options.description: Sets the radius of terrain updates sent to players
options.name: View Distance

options.description: Determines the radius of the spawn protection.
options.name: Spawn Protection

options.description: The seed determines the way your world looks
options.name: World Seed

options.description: The settings used to customize Superflat world generation.
options.name: Generator Settings

options.description: Game mode for the server; Survival or Creative
options.name: Game Mode

options.description: If set to true, players will always login in the default gamemode, not what they last logged out as
options.name: Force game mode

options.description: Difficulty of game, damage and hunger effects
options.name: Difficulty

options.description: What commands OP users can use, see http://www.minecraftwiki.net/wiki/Server.properties
options.name: OP Permission Level

options.description: If set to true, players will be permanently banned if they die
options.name: Hardcore mode

options.description: Message that is displayed in the client server browser
options.name: Server Message

options.description: Whether to generate structures such as villages
options.name: Generate Structures

options.description: Enables command blocks in game
options.name: Enable Command Blocks

options.description: Type of world generation
options.name: Level Type

options.description: Maximum height you can build to.
options.name: Build Height

options.description: Allow querying of server info
options.name: Enable Querying

options.description: Sets whether the server sends snoop data regularly to snoop.minecraft.net
options.name: Enable Official data sharing

options.description: URL to texture pack to offer to clients
options.name: Texture Pack URL
